properties.name: Sar Pohl (Puhal; Pukal; Pujal; Pohl; Pol), Khamir County, Hormozgan Province, Iran
properties.description:
Sar Pohl (Puhal; Pukal; Pujal; Pohl; Pol), Khamir County, Hormozgan Province, Iran

Location: Iran

Mountain of salt extruded from a diapir at the eastern end of the Zagros anticline. Located about 60 km west of Bandar Abbas.

View on Mindat.org
